An Ubuntu presence at the National Educational Computing Conference shall take place with the Ubuntu presence hosted by Yorktown High School (Arlington, VA), Technology Rescue, and Manheim Township School District (Lancaster, PA), the Linux E-mail Garden/Open Source Lab features students and educators engaged in an open source environment. Mini-workshops will be given hourly on free, open source software and its uses in the curriculum. Stop by, check your e-mail, and learn about GNU/Linux and other free software including GIMP, Open Office, MSQL, Firefox, and more.
